Package com.epam.services.impl

Class TariffServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.epam.services.impl.TariffServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TariffService
public class TariffServiceImpl extends Object implements TariffService
Tariff Service implementation. It contains methods to interact with the DAO and has some business logic.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hrebenozhko Ruslan

    • getTariffsForView

      public List<TariffDTO> getTariffsForView(String fieldName, SortingOrder sortingOrder, Service service, int page, int entriesPerPage) throws TariffServiceException
      This method returns sorted and filtered by Service list of Tariffs.
      Specified by:
      getTariffsForView in interface TariffService
      Parameters:
      fieldName - name of the field to sort.
      sortingOrder - sorting order.
      service - A service to show.
      page - page number to show.
      entriesPerPage - number of tariff to show in the page.
      Returns:
      list of TariffsDTO to show.
      Throws:
      TariffServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.
